articles.title: Duterte calls for international cooperation to boost economic recovery - Philstar.com
articles.description: President Duterte called for closer international cooperation to hasten the economic recovery of Asia-Pacific states from the COVID-19 pandemic as he addressed the 28th Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation last Friday.

articles.title: Mavcom says air travellers not creditors, wants AirAsia X to reimburse customers - Malaysiakini
